Description:
Detects when successful sign-ins increased by 10% or greater.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', MikeDuddington, '@dudders1', Tim Shelton
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Measurable Increase Of Successful Authentications
Query: sourcetype='azure-signinlogs' eql select * from _source_ where status = 'success' and count = '<10%'
